lead_paragraph: Ronell Wilson, who was convicted in the 2003 killings, had been found to be intellectually disabled and thus ineligible for the death penalty.

headline.main: Prosecutors Appeal Ruling That Killer of 2 Detectives Can’t Be Executed

snippet: Ronell Wilson, who was convicted in the 2003 killings, had been found to be intellectually disabled and thus ineligible for the death penalty.
